title: [1.7.10][ssp/smp]拿起你的激光枪杀死怪物吧！光晕MOD【3d枪械】
txt_content:
我也不知道有没有人搬运过，只是比较喜欢这个MOD就发上来了。



光晕MOD有四种载具十多种枪，增加许多方块
作者的介绍很少只给了几个地址{:10_527:}
里面的武器有专属弹道做得很好（本来想汉化但物品太多....%>_<%）
MOD地图：http://www.minecraftforum.net/fo ... k-recreation-30-000

MOD官网：http://www.killerchief.net/halocraft.php
作者原文：
KILLER CHIEF -------------- Coder, Modeller, Map Maker, Managing Forum & Mod. A Bit of everything 
Camo7 ---------------------- Texturing, Skinning, Modeling, UNSC/Covenant/Forerunner/Flood Architect.
Hellcraftjz ------------------ Texturing, Skinning.
The Micahel ---------------- Modelling, Skinning for Models.
Brenwwe ------------------- CoderFabulousMissLuna ------- 3D Gun modelle

More Information on the mod can be found here: www.killerchief.net/halocraft.php
It includes information about setting up the mod as well as the crafting recipes and all the content the mod introduces into Minecraft.

Halo maps remade in Minecraft:
Minecraft Halo Map Pack by onimushaiz: www.minecraftforum.net/topic/552120-/

Downloads & Links:
Go Here for Download Links and Information: 
www.killerchief.net/halocraft.php?p=hc-downloads

下载地址：http://pan.baidu.com/s/1jGmY0D4
{:10_557:}发完搞定！
